description: FIGURES 107–111. Calapnita anai sp. nov. (ZFMK, Ar 16016). 107–109. Left procursus, prolateral, dorsal, and retrolateral views. 110. Left bulbal appendix, prolateral view. 111. Cleared female genitalia, dorsal view. Scale lines: 0.5 mm (all male structures at same scale).
name: FIGURES 107–111 in Revision and cladistic analysis of the Southeast Asian leaf-dwelling spider genus Calapnita Simon (Araneae, Pholcidae)
